data.name: Nodes
data.detailed_description:
Nodes is an upcoming 2D top-down RPG game filled with many friends and unsuspecting inhabitants, and many more enemies, all in a colorless world.


Features


-Party Members
Now you don't have to play the game alone!
-Bullets
Dodge various different attack patterns from over 50+ original enemies!
-Simple Ink Visuals
Strange flat characters inhabiting a simple world.
-Battle System
A battle system where you dodge bullets raining down from nearly any where on screen (similar to Undertale lol)
-Unique art style
Experience a world lacking colour, but beaming with charm.
-Woah that's a lot of Items
Around 40 different weapons, armour, and items to collect, all with their own unique abilities.
-Work for minimum wage
Work for minimum wage in over 10 different jobs!
-Online mode
Tired of playing alone? Bring in some friends and cause havoc!

data.short_description: An RPG where everything is drawn in a notebook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or XP
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: You would pretty much have to close all windows to run this game on those specs

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: if you can run other 2D games on steam you should be OK
  • Processor: 1.1GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Are graphics really that important for a 2D game with no color?
